question:
Consider the following statements about the recently launched Sampoorna Bima Gram (SBG) Yojana:
  1. It is an initiative by Ministry of Communications to provide banking services to rural poor through the postal network
  2. Under the scheme, at least one village in every district of the country will be identified as Sampoorna Bima Gram village and all households of the village will be covered with at least one Rural Postal Life Insurance policy
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Recently, the Minister for Communications Shri Manoj Sinha launched the Sampoorna Bima Gram (SBG) Yojana. The scheme aims to provide banking services to rural people in the country through the postal network. Under the scheme, a minimum of one village will be identified as Sampoorna Bima Gram Yojna in every district of the country, and efforts will be made to cover all households of the village with at least one Rural Postal Life Insurance policy each. All villages under the Saansad Adarsh Gram Yojana will be brought under its ambit. The scheme will ensure that the benefits of Postal Life Insurance (PLI) will no more be confined to Government and semi-Government employees, but will also be available to professionals such as Doctors, Engineers, Management Consultants, Charted Accountants, Architects, Lawyers, Bankers etc. and to employees of listed companies of NSE (National Stock Exchange) and BSE (Bombay Stock Exchange).
